name: Vampire Nights (Ago251)
description:
Vampire Nights is a stealth turn based game in tabletop style, where a vampire prince fights rival sun temple by sucking his enemies' blood and using it to cast black magic spells

Team:

Position Member Game designers Michele Ribechini Emanuele Rombecchi Guido Fabbri Andrea Sala Concept artists Giulia Gentilini Martha Pestelli Alice Arca Alex Rossi Alessandro Bongini Matteo Farnesi Michele Furia Programmers Andrea Agostini Jacopo Innocenti Luca Palermo
